name: EasyLogging
short_description:
Introduction:-
EasyLogging827 jar can be easily imported in your project and can be easily used to log the outputs. You
can use these outputs for monitoring purpose later on.




Instruction on using EasyLogging827:-
1) First import it in your java project.

2) Call following static methods on MyLogger class:-

   2.1) errorMsg(String s)

   2.2) infoMsg(String s)

   2.3) debugMsg(String s)

   2.4) warningMsg(String s)

3) Pass the output in the form of String objects in these static methods.

4) Log will be generated at your C:\ drive with log file name called 'log827'.


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
$$$ Happy Logging with EasyLogging827 $$$
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
